topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a0df4e6368725b9d5a1200#post_54a0df4e6368725b9d5a1200
Yeah, I can definately relate to that, ...-ish. My dad drank so often that he had a stroke or suffered from something with stroke like symptoms back in early '11, he's lucky to have survived.

Fast forward to now and it turns out he didn't learn a damn thing from damn near dying and is drinking just as much as he did before, and is an even grumpier, insufferable git.
